meaning_str.bing:
n. 淋浴；阵雨；淋浴器；淋浴间
v. （洗）淋浴；洒落；纷纷降落；抛撒
网络. 洗澡；沐浴；花洒

淋浴；阵雨；淋浴器；淋浴间

淋浴；淋浴设备；阵雨；阵雪；送礼会；流星雨；一连串（事物）；一大批；一群乌合之众；一群笨蛋
（洗）淋浴；抛撒；倾盆而下；使纷纷降落；（用水）冲洗；浇灌；（礼物、祝福等）大量赠予；使洒落；使涌现

1.en: Fifth, drink less and avoid cigarettes. Alcohol does harms to sleep. Smoking stimulates the body as if you were taking a cold shower.
1.cn: 第五，少喝酒，别抽烟。酒精能使睡眠不好。抽烟的刺激作用就像用冷水洗澡一样。

2.en: During pregnancy the extra estrogen in your system is responsible for less strands ending up in your brush and down the shower drain.
2.cn: 怀孕期间身体系统内多余的雌激素保证你每天梳子上和洗漱池里面掉少量的头发。

3.en: Just a few meteors per hour stream away from the shower's radiant point near bright star Vega in the constellation Lyra .
3.cn: 天琴座中明亮的恒星是流星的源头，每小时只有几颗流出。

0.en: We'll do it in the shower. That's good. Won't fall asleep in the big fancy shower.
0.cn: 我们要边淋浴边做，超爽。可别在豪华淋浴间睡着了。

1.en: Girl, why didn't you tell me a shower could be this good?
1.cn: 姐妹，你为什么从来没告诉我淋浴可以这么舒服？

2.en: It was either that or a bag of Oreos. So I chose a shower.
2.cn: 要么淋浴，要么就去吃一袋奥利奥饼干，于是我选择去冲个澡。

3.en: And I was in the shower along time. And as I was in the shower the words of an old hymn came to me, you may not know it. It's "By and by, when the morning comes".
3.cn: 在我淋浴的时候，一首古老的赞美诗闪过脑海，你们可能没听过这个“耐心等待，曙光终将到来。”

4.en: Max, what are we gonna do without a working shower? Where will I cry? And where will I hide from you?
4.cn: 麦克斯，我们家的淋浴坏了该怎么办？我以后还能去哪里哭啊？我以后也不知道去哪里躲你了？

5.en: And we'll order room service before. That way we will finish our loud adult shower sex just as room service arrives and we will slip on robes and eat burgers. No, wait spaghetti. No, I like burgers better. We will eat burgers in bed.
5.cn: 在此之前我们得先叫客房服务。这样一来，在结束成人式淋浴放荡性爱后，正好来客房服务，。我们就可以穿着浴袍啃汉堡，不，慢着，意大利面。不，我还是喜欢汉堡。我们要躺在床上啃汉堡。

6.en: So when can we have this shower?
6.cn: 我们何时能开这个告别单身女子派对？

7.en: How was your shower? It was good, good.

8.en: But your hair looks disgusting. Did you even shower?
8.cn: 但你的头发很恶，你有没洗澡啊？

9.en: As for the shower capacity issue, I cite addendum J.
9.cn: 至于浴室容量问题，我引用附录J。

10.en: Hey. I've got a great idea for party favors for the shower.
10.cn: 我有个派对主题的好主意。

11.en: Oh, I did spend a lot of my shower time with Lieutenant Uhura.
11.cn: 我的浴室"自乐"时间有不少是跟乌乎拉通讯官度过的。

12.en: I won first place for this. So did I. I threw Jenny's baby shower.
12.cn: 这作品让我得了第一。我也是。我为珍妮举办了迎婴派对。

13.en: One of them could end up in the backseat of her car, or her shower.
13.cn: 可以扔一个进她的汽车后座，或是她的浴室。

14.en: Hello. I slipped in the shower, and I think I dislocated my shoulder.
14.cn: 你好。我在浴缸里滑倒了，我觉得肩膀好像脱臼了。

15.en: So I got off the phone with President Faust, and I went to the shower.
15.cn: 于是我挂断了福斯特校长的电话，然后去洗了个澡。

16.en: FYI, bottomless shaving cream in the shower. Gave myself a Santa beard.
16.cn: 仅供参考，浴室里有下体除毛膏，我刚给自己弄了圣诞老人胡的造型。

17.en: All right, I got to shower. You guys, make yourselves comfortable. Okay.
17.cn: 好的，我得去洗澡了，你们自己好好玩吧。好的。

18.en: And they live together and shower together and have naked pillow fights?
18.cn: 她们住在一起，一同沐浴，还裸体枕头大战。

19.en: I had to take another shower. It wasn't enough. Nothing will ever be enough.
19.cn: 害我得重洗了一次澡，但洗了也没用，洗得了身子，洗不去创伤。
